org.cyclops.cyclopscore.recipe.xml

Interface IItemTypeHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommonRecipeTypeHandler, DefaultItemTypeHandler, GridRecipeTypeHandler, PredefinedItemTypeHandler, ShapedRecipeTypeHandler, ShapelessRecipeTypeHandler, SmeltingRecipeTypeHandler, SuperRecipeTypeHandler, TagItemTypeHandler

    public interface IItemTypeHandler
    Handler for different types of item declaration inside the xml recipe file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      net.minecraft.item.crafting.Ingredient getIngredient(RecipeHandler recipeHandler, org.w3c.dom.Node itemNode)
      Get the item for this type of handler for the given node element, can just be a text node.

    • Method Detail

      • getIngredient

        net.minecraft.item.crafting.Ingredient getIngredient(RecipeHandler recipeHandler,
                                                     org.w3c.dom.Node itemNode)
                                              throws XmlRecipeLoader.XmlRecipeException
        Get the item for this type of handler for the given node element, can just be a text node.
        Parameters:
        recipeHandler - The handler.
        itemNode - The node containing info about this item, for example "<item>evilcraft:darkGem</item>"
        Returns:
        An ingredient.
        Throws:
        XmlRecipeLoader.XmlRecipeException - If an error occured
